solution_line_template: He read {book1_pages_read} pages from the {book1_total_pages} page book because {book1_total_pages} x {book1_read_fraction} = <<{book1_total_pages}*{book1_read_fraction}={book1_pages_read}>>{book1_pages_read}

He read {book2_pages_read} pages from the {book2_total_pages} page book because {book2_total_pages} x ({book2_read_fraction}) = <<{book2_total_pages}*({book2_read_fraction})={book2_pages_read}>>{book2_pages_read}
He has read {total_pages_read} pages in total.
He needs to read {pages_remaining} more pages to reach {goal_pages} pages because {goal_pages} - {total_pages_read} = <<{goal_pages}-{total_pages_read}={pages_remaining}>>{pages_remaining}
